posts.post_content: Spirits just got better now with the new Innistrad [Morkrut Banshee](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Morkrut Banshee). Sac this guy, play the [Morkrut Banshee](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Morkrut Banshee), give a creature -5/-5 and return a 4CMC spirit to your hand. Maybe [Keening Banshee](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keening Banshee) or [Infernal Kirin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Infernal Kirin). Or maybe even [Graveborn Muse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Graveborn Muse); every upkeep draw a card and lose one life ([Phyrexian Arena](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Arena) on legs, since it would be the only zombie in the deck).
posts.html:
Spirits just got better now with the new Innistrad Morkrut Banshee. Sac this guy, play the Morkrut Banshee, give a creature -5/-5 and return a 4CMC spirit to your hand. Maybe Keening Banshee or Infernal Kirin. Or maybe even Graveborn Muse; every upkeep draw a card and lose one life (Phyrexian Arena on legs, since it would be the only zombie in the deck).
